analyzeResult.content:
(Make address changes on this label.)
PRODUCT OPINION LABORATORY P.O. Box 26563 - Richmond, Va. 23261 Phone: (804) 271-3368
RETURN BALLOT BY
R-4571 R
Dear Panelist:
With this ballot I am sending you ten packs of cigarettes coded as follows: S7-3 packs, N5 - 3 packs, Q9 - 4 packs. Remember, you do not have to smoke all of the cigarettes - only as many as you need to complete the questionnaire.
When this questionnaire is completely filled out, please return it to me in the enclosed postage-paid envelope. Thank you very much - your cooperation in this test is most helpful.
D. F. Reynolds Panel Leader
PLEASE READ ENTIRE BALLOT BEFORE STARTING TEST
PART I
First smoke some of the cigarettes marked S7 and then the cigarettes marked N5. Then compare the two cigarettes with each other and complete the questions below:
S7
N5
Both
Neither
1.
The smoke was too strong or too harsh.
2.
It was a satisfying, pleasurable smoke.
3.
The smoke was too hot.
4.
The smoke was flavorful and fresh-tasting.
5.
It was too weak a cigarette.
6.
The smoke of the cigarette smelled bad.
Now, all things considered, which do you prefer?
(circle one) S7 N5 No Preference
Check the box that best describes how you feel about the overall acceptability of the cigarette coded S7 .

Check the box that best describes how you feel about the overall acceptability of the cigarette coded N5 .
L
PART II
L 1 Now smoke the cigarettes marked Q9 . Smoke only as many as you need in order to make this judgment. If you need to refresh your memory, go back and smoke some of "the S7 and N5 cigarettes. Be sure to circle one or the other, even if you are uncertain.

With this ballot I am sending you ten packs of cigarettes coded as follows: S7-3 packs, N5 - 3 packs, Q9 - 4 packs. Remember, you do not have to smoke all of the cigarettes - only as many as you need to complete the questionnaire.
When this questionnaire is completely filled out, please return it to me in the enclosed postage-paid envelope. Thank you very much - your cooperation in this test is most helpful.
PLEASE READ ENTIRE BALLOT BEFORE STARTING TEST
First smoke some of the cigarettes marked S7 and then the cigarettes marked N5. Then compare the two cigarettes with each other and complete the questions below:
The smoke was too strong or too harsh.

Now, all things considered, which do you prefer?
